recs.title: ascendance of a bookworm
recs.title_original: 本好きの下剋上 ～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～
recs.review: bookworm, ironically, does isekai v well: there's a lot abt cultural n linguistic barriers. the world it presents 4 this is in itself intriguing n learning yr way thru it along w the mc is v fun. theres also a good amnt abt familial love which is nice. the novels r obv the best choice for such a story, the manga is alright ig, n the anime looks like a pbs cartoon which im not in2.

recs.title: asumi-chan is interested in lesbian brothels!
recs.title_original: 彩純ちゃんはレズ風俗に興味があります!
recs.review: some softcore yuri. asumi just wants 2 find her old crush who seems to now b working at a brothel somewhere so shes just gotta visit every girl that vaguely resembles her. v adorable.

recs.title: the blood princess and the knight
recs.title_original: 血姬与骑士
recs.review: blood princess has this weird thing where its set in a modern era but is so classically fantasy u kinda forget that. its got this cute mc whose identity at first seems like a point of pride (a human merely forced into becoming a vampire) yet slowly erodes in2 whatever is convenient at the time. it has the typical reverence for ancient civilization u see in fantasy, but it plays it p well imo. the web novel is aight, but i prefer the manhua.

recs.title: bocchi the rock! (btr)
recs.title_original: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！
recs.review: that pink creature sure is scared of everything, just like me! btr is abt a bunch of locals starting a band n being friends. the manga is a 4-koma n the anime is full length eps which rly add to the experience as all adaptations should.

recs.title: even if im reborn as a cute dragon girl, i will still make a harem (dragon princess)
recs.title_original: 就算穿越成龙族萝莉吾也要开后宫
recs.review: chuuni guy gets reborn as a princess w such a bizarre backstory that just talking abt it sounds chuuni. its v fun, tho some of the language used is a bit iffy at the start. the bit kinda fades in2 the background so it doesnt get 2 boring. i rly enjoy the thing abt dragons all being kinda stupid j bc theyve got an eternity 2 do things if they want 2.

recs.title: from the new world
recs.title_original: 新世界より
recs.review: post-apocalyptic supernatural fantasy abt kids w psychic powers uncovering conspiracies n such. the manga is rly good. watch the anime if ur homophobic.

recs.title: himitsu no akuma-chan
recs.title_original: ひみつの悪魔ちゃん
recs.review: boy meets boy(?) type romcom. i dont think its rly that fair 2 just call kogure a boy, but u can decide for yrself after reading the manga ig. its a story abt like overcoming prejudice, or abt following thru on the things (ppl?) u set 2 do.

recs.title: i don't want to be turned into the female protagonist by the system
recs.title_original: 我才不要被系统变成女主角啊
recs.review: the most prey coded yuri mc o all time. hentai artist slowly gets transformed in2 their 'ideal' female protag by a system that seems 2 have ulterior motives (n not just selling overpriced clothes 2 the mc).

recs.title: in order to repay the debt, i became a magical girl
recs.title_original: 为了还债我成为了魔法少女
recs.review: the title says quite a bit. the magical girl system that the mc ends up w is based on 'love points' which certainly can b gained by fighting monsters, but w a name like that theres certainly a better way. peak magical girl tsf, basically mesuochi yuri.

recs.title: is it funny that the dragon slayer failed and became the dragon princess?
recs.title_original: 屠龙失败变成龙族公主很好笑吗？
recs.review: this is a lot like a comedy version of 'the blood princess and the knight.' theres a lesser ammt of political intrigue but way more of the mc being an adorable tsundere. its the post-apocalypse fantasy type setting.

recs.title: is it weird for a guy to apply to a witch school?
recs.title_original: 身为男生志愿填魔女学院很奇怪吗
recs.review: ive taken to describing this series as lore with plot; its tsf yuri n it rly shows in the early parts, but later it becomes entirely focused on the mc researching magic. theres a lot of trees involved, the mc cant stop growin em!

recs.title: kämpfer
recs.title_original: けんぷファー
recs.review: kämpfer is bad n also not good, but! gender bender magical girl series all speak 2 me in some arcane fashion compelling me 2 see them thru. "kissing girls is more important than fighting!" its truly been stuck in my head since high school. highly recommend.

recs.title: kill la kill
recs.title_original: キルラキル
recs.review: its all a metaphor, u see. its a studio trigger show so the animation is banger, the soundtrack slaps, n everything is over the top... also theyre so totally girlfriends but the show isnt abt that so we only get 2 see them going out in the ed, ig.

recs.title: machikado mazoku (machimazo)
recs.title_original: まちカドまぞく
recs.review: demon vs magical girl enemies to lovers type yuri except theyre like basically girlfriends the whole time. its cgdct as always. the manga is 4-koma but the anime is full length eps anyway so give either a shot.

recs.title: mieruko-chan
recs.title_original: 見える子ちゃん
recs.review: its, like, comedy slice-of-life horror? miko can see demons but shes trying to be chill abt it. is it working? idk mb. the anime is ok but like any horror the art in the manga is much better.

recs.title: ookami shounen wa kyou mo uso o kasaneru
recs.title_original: 狼少年は今日も嘘を重ねる
recs.review: i cant think of a single way 2 tell some1 2 read ookami shounen w/o spoiling it. its only 5 vol, just read it. read it. it hurts so good. its so cute.

recs.title: the pet girl of sakurasou
recs.title_original: さくら荘のペットな彼女
recs.review: sakurasou is all abt dreams n finding what u can do yrself, i think, in a way its abt accepting yr own mediocrity. it went rly hard when i was in hs, but ive already learned to live w failure so i never bothered to read the ln.

recs.title: puella magi madoka magica (madomagi)
recs.title_original: 魔法少女まどか★マギカ
recs.review: one of the anime of all time. like any cgdct series, madomagi manages 2 avoid being classed as yuri while being 1 of the gayest things uve ever seen. its a story of love (or 'friendship' for the haters) transcending suffering n shattering any notion of natural law that may stand in its way. as its an original, i recommend watching the anime, n u can choose any number of spinoff manga or adaptations to read from there.

recs.title: re:creators
recs.title_original: re:creators 〈レクリエイターズ〉
recs.review: re:creators is like a meta commentary on the media, specifically regarding the worlds within fiction. regardless of the stances proposed by it, its definitely worth a watch just 4 the discussion. its an original anime so just watch it.

recs.title: serial experiments lain
recs.title_original: シリアルエクスペリメンツレイン
recs.review: lain is often seen as a story of being truly on-line, being part of a world wholly separate from the real. this is, ofc, appealing 2 any1 attracted 2 that same notion w the internet. a good watch when u just want out. its a part of a multimedia release, paired w a ps1 game which ive shamefully never played, but the anime stands well enough on its own.

recs.title: shirobako
recs.title_original: shirobako
recs.review: is shirobako cgdct? its girls in the anime industry, all trying 2 accomplish their dreams but having to, yknow, b working adults the whole time. the most unrealistic part is that they never outsource their work 2 overseas studios, but its a p interesting look in2 the industry otherwise. imai 'diesel' midori is just like me fr.

recs.title: sousou no frieren
recs.title_original: 葬送のフリーレン
recs.review: a post-adventure story, in a sense that makes it abt the process of coming to terms w yr emotions. its basically a longform ver of going 'wait, was he flirting w me!?' the way demons are presented garners fair discussion abt the need 4 a true 'other' in fantasy, tho. the manga is good n the anime is v well animated, but the dub sucks.

recs.title: what are you doing at the end? are you busy? can you save me? (sukasuka)
recs.title_original: 終末なにしてますか？忙しいですか？救ってもらっていいですか？
recs.review: sukasuka has 1 of those fantasy reincarnation premises (tho he isnt really reincarnated) where some hero comes back long after their death n helps reclaim the lost glory of the past. but he doesnt do that n everything just sucks instead. ive not read the books so i can only say the anime is good.

recs.title: zankyou no terror
recs.title_original: 残響のテロル
recs.review: mappa can do it if they try! its just terrorism n vibes, an 'original' anime but we all know its actually an adaptation of sigur rós's music. lisa is just like me fr.
